div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1713 Delta, 1964 Burial: 89 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 56 AR Ptolemy VI: 3 tetradr. (Alexandreia as Svoronos 1489, 1445) Ptolemy IX Soter II: 5 tetradr. (Alex- andreia as Sv. 1670-1) Ptolemy X Alexander I and Cleopatra: 11 tetradr. (Alexandreia as Sv. 1727-9) Ptolemy X Alexander I alone: 37 tetradr. (Alexandreia as Sv. 1677-9, 1684-5) Disposition: dispersed Information from R. Hazzard, Toronto
